name: Piano Tiles 3 - Magic Piano
description:
Do you love Piano Magic Tiles 3 with Hot Songs 2020?
If so then try this magic piano tiles game, It has almost all Pop,Clasic,Edm,Popular songs.

Do you love magic piano tile games?Have you ever dreamed of becoming a professional pianist?Have you ever dreamed of playing best piano songs ?
Now your dream can come true. With this game, even a child can play piano tiles songs like a real piano master.
Are you a music piano mania or lover play the best piano game with the most popular dream piano songs.

Try to follow the rythm and the music beat by taping on the magic black tiles, and enjoy the best piano songs.


How to play Piano Tiles 3:
- Tap the black magic tiles.
- Tap and hold on the blue tiles.
- Tap double black tiles at the same time.
- Tap and hold on the double blue tiles at the same time.
- Avoid the white tiles


Game Features :
- Free daily chests and diamonds that helps you unlock the songs.
- Simple design and graphics. Easy to play and everybody can be the piano expert.
- High-quality music soundtracks and sound effects.
- The hot songs and speed of the notes are interactive and controlled by your finger taps.
- Different colored graphics for a different experience each time you collect an additional star.
- Fun and smooth game play
- +200 hot songs 2020 to play
- Reach the best achievements to unlock the songs
- All songs are available for free and can be played offline.

Game rules:
-Tap on the black tiles while listening to music and avoid the white tiles.

If you enjoy Piano Tiles - Hot Songs 2020 game please support us by sharing it with your friends, leaving a good rating and giving us your feedback, it will help us a lot making the game better.
